document_data.mainbody:
Lady Yuth was a merchant of magic scrolls, who did business in the City of Coin, Athkatla in Amn in the 14 century DR.
By the , Lady Yuth could be found selling her curios and enchanted wares at the Adventurer Mart in Athkatlas grand Waukeens Promenade. Lady Yuth talked to customers whom she noticed searching for very specific merchandise, dealing in her schools from behind a bookshelf, away from prying eyes. She held little respect for the Cowled Wizards and thought them to be corrupt fools, like every other person in the position of power in Athkatla.
